spimalot 0.3.1
  • Reference

spimalot

This package exists to centralise much of our scripts around running sircovid on SPI-M data streams. As such the package will be of limited to use to people outside of our group. We make no effort to maintain backward compatibility.

Installation

To install spimalot:

remotes::install_github("mrc-ide/spimalot", upgrade = FALSE)
